calcTaronesTest()
Tarones test for Stratified OR (integrated from https://github.com/the8thday/ClinStats/blob/master/R/Tarones.R). The original MIT license is included in the source code. The function is included for validation purpose. Please use the most updated function in ClinStats package for related calculation in a non-GLP environment.
